messages.text:
Hello dave@cheney.net (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.net

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=3e9614221450&repo=net ***

go.net/ipv4: simplify socket option helpers

R=dave
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/9379043

On Sun, Jun 16, 2013 at 8:26 PM,  <dave@cheney.net> wrote:

> LGTM. Nice reduction in LOC.

Well, those are part of fragments from the net package, I mean you
committed and I removed a year ago. ;)
A few more refactoring CLs for go.net/ipv4 will come, thank you for your review.

subject: code review 9379043: go.net/ipv4: simplify socket option helpers
